DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine treatment vitamin D3 10,000 International Units ( IU ) daily vitamin D deficient patient 6 month improve B type natriuretic peptide ( BNP ) , marker heart function , compare placebo . The investigator also aim determine vitamin D help cardiopulmonary function evaluate cardiopulmonary exercise test ( CPX ) , laboratory value , strength , quality life patient stable congestive heart failure ( Class II III ) .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D3 Supplementation Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: NYHA Heart Failure Class II II , stable Vitamin D deficiency ( 32 ng/ml less ) No recent medication change 3 month Females childbearing age must use effective contraceptive sexually active Hypercalcemia Nephrolithiases Sarcoidosis Acute cardiac insufficiency Pregnancy Breastfeeding Any clinically unstable medical condition Supplements great equal 1000 unit vitamin D per day
